medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant abdominal pain and anorexia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced intermittent abdominal pain over the last two weeks, which worsened this morning with severe pain in the right lower quadrant that intermittently radiated to her back and side. No vomiting or diarrhea, but she reported nausea. Currently, the patient is denying any complaints and is confused about her hospitalization.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Dementia, coronary artery disease, peripheral vascular disease, hypertension, nephrolithiasis, status post C-section, status post laparoscopic cholecystectomy, and status post bilateral femoral angioplasty 5 weeks ago.
